misc: Has been working on his mental game a lot
biography: Eero, the younger brother of the esteemed Pasi, is a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, representing the Vuosaari Golf Helsinki. With a meticulous approach to the game, Eero's presence is always noted by fellow competitors.

Eero is set to make his eighth appearance at the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025. Despite not having yet claimed the Hector Trophée itself, Eero has demonstrated his individual capabilities by securing the Victor Trophy once in the past.

Known for his diligent preparation and focus, Eero has been working assiduously on fortifying his mental fortitude, a trait that may prove invaluable as he seeks to navigate the challenges of the upcoming tournament. Only time will tell if this dedicated work will propel him to new heights in the competition.
